desc: Buy 100% Eco Friendly Plates Online. ChicLeaf Natural Palm Leaf Plates made from Areca Palm Leaves. 100% Biodegradable, Sustainably Sourced, No Dyes, Toxins, Chemicals. Eco Friendly Plate Alternative to Plastic Plates & Paper Plates. Buy Eco Friendly Plates with Free Deliver at ChicLeaf

layout.text: Palm leaf plates for a better planet

Chic Leaf’s collection of palm leaf plates and palm leaf trays are 100% natural, zero-waste and compostable. Made from Areca Palm Leaves, our plates are the beautiful and sustainable alternative to plastic
